meanings.definition: A soft object or material used to protect or support something.
meanings.sent1: The cushioning on the chair made it more comfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent2: She added extra cushioning to the package to ensure the fragile items wouldn't break.
meanings.sent3: The cushioning on the helmet made the football player look like a marshmallow.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words acted as a cushioning for his disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The fluffy cushioning felt like a cloud under her head.

meanings.definition: The act of providing protection or support.
meanings.sent1: His cushioning of her feelings showed his empathy.
meanings.sent2: The cushioning of the fragile vase prevented it from shattering.
meanings.sent3: The cushioning of the fall with a mattress made it less scary.
meanings.sent4: The cushioning of the blow softened the impact.
meanings.sent5: The cushioning of the tree branches saved the cat from a high fall.
